item.title: Crisp Topping
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup gluten-free all-purpose flour with xanthan gum 1/2 cup gluten-free rolled oats 1/2 cup light brown sugar, packed 1/2 teaspoon gluten-free baking powder 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/8 teaspoon salt (omit if butter is salted) 1/3 cup butter, diced into small cubes and softened Notes Pillsbury gluten-free flour works great Directions blend all ingredients with a pastry-blender spread on a fruit crisp base and bake
